template.subject: %APPLICATION_NAME% Community Invitation from %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME%
template.body:
Dear %TO_FULLNAME%,
%FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% has just added you to the %COMMUNITY_TITLE% community in %APPLICATION_NAME%.
Since you already have a guest account in another community we have simply given you access using your existing username and password. Please click the following link access to the %COMMUNITY_TITLE% community:
%COMMUNITY_URL%
Reminder: Your username is %USERNAME%, and if you have forgotten your password you can click the "Forgot Your Password?" link on the login page.
Should you have any questions or concerns please contact %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% directly.
Sincerely,
%APPLICATION_NAME%
